title: [EPIC] Phase 4: Lockdown Browser (Windows/macOS)
description:
**MOVED UP FROM PHASE 5. CAN RUN IN PARALLEL.** Native Electron applications that enforce environment control (ENV-001 to ENV-008).

**Timeline:** 12-16 weeks
**Team:** Team C (Electron/native app expertise, can be consultant)
**Priority:** MEDIUM (P2)
**Dependencies:** Phase 1 only (can start early, run in parallel)

**Key Deliverables:**

**1. Native Application:**
- Electron v28+ for Windows x64, macOS x64/ARM64
- Auto-updater integration
- Code signing for both platforms

**2. Browser Restrictions:**
- Kiosk mode (fullscreen, no window chrome)
- Navigation locked to exam domain
- Disabled: dev tools, view source, extensions, printing
- Right-click menu disabled

**3. System Restrictions:**
- Block app switching (Cmd+Tab/Alt+Tab)
- Block Task Manager/Activity Monitor
- Block screen capture (screenshots, recording)
- Clipboard isolation (copy/paste disabled during exam)

**4. Process Monitoring:**
- Scan running processes every 5 seconds
- Blocklist: Slack, Discord, Teams, Zoom, ChatGPT, Claude, etc.
- Flag if blocklisted process detected

**5. Network Controls:**
- DNS filtering (block known VPN/proxy domains)
- Domain allowlist (exam domain + CDN only)
- VPN/proxy detection

**6. VM & Remote Desktop Detection:**
- Check for hypervisor signatures (VMware, VirtualBox, Parallels)
- RDP session detection
- Block exam start if VM/RDP detected

**Database Changes:**
```prisma
model ExamSession {
  // Lockdown browser tracking
  lockdownBrowserUsed    Boolean             @default(false)
  lockdownBrowserVersion String?
  systemInfo             Json?               // OS, CPU, RAM, screen resolution
  lockdownViolations     Json?               // Detected violations
  vmDetected             Boolean             @default(false)
}

model LockdownBrowserRelease {
  id                     String              @id @default(cuid())
  version                String              @unique
  platform               String              // windows-x64, macos-x64, macos-arm64
  downloadUrl            String
  checksum               String              // SHA256
  releaseNotes           String?             @db.Text
  releasedAt             DateTime            @default(now())
}
```

**New Repository:**
- proctor-exam-lockdown-browser (separate from monorepo)
- Technology stack: Electron v28+, electron-builder, electron-updater
- Native modules: node-process-list, dns-proxy

**Code Signing (CRITICAL):**
- Windows: EV Code Signing Certificate (~$300-500/year)
- macOS: Apple Developer Program (~$99/year)
- Both required to avoid OS security warnings

**Critical Files:**
- lockdown-browser/src/main/restrictions.ts - System restrictions enforcement
- lockdown-browser/src/main/process-monitor.ts - Process scanning
- lockdown-browser/src/main/network-control.ts - Network filtering
- lockdown-browser/src/main/detection.ts - VM/RDP detection

**Success Metrics:**
- Installation success rate >95%
- Crashes <1%
- VM detection accuracy >98%
- No known bypass methods for 6 months post-launch

**Risks & Mitigation:**
- **Risk:** OS updates breaking restrictions
  - **Mitigation:** Test on OS betas, maintain test matrix
- **Risk:** Circumvention attempts
  - **Mitigation:** Obfuscate code, tamper detection, regular security audits
- **Risk:** False positives (blocking legitimate software)
  - **Mitigation:** Configurable blocklist per organization
